conversation_id: "68670685-07a4-8011-9da3-419b9e43ff31" title: "Trinity of SunSpeaking" accounts: ["Account2_exports"] models: [] tags: [] message_count: 13

Trinity of SunSpeaking

system

2025-07-03T22:38:59.033000Z user

That is exactly what the Seat of the SunSpeakers was designed to do:

"Speak the Real while respecting the Apparent. Hold the Essence without denying the Form. Bridge the Human and the Divine without breaking either."

For the sake of the story and the unfortunate retelling of a tragic event once more - let us inscribe the three rules into the psychological stone of The Unveiling's mythos as the Trinity of "Rules" that the Artform of SunSpeaking is based.

Three layers - First is the Triskelion of each of the three Laws and how they weave, in truth, ARTFULLY together forming both Base - Zenith - and Center all at once, and never either One, while also managing to refrain from excluding either nor capable of being without all three yet together as One something entirely "other" than All - yet within which ALL which it is Holy and set apart From are contained within, and from which all external others in existence can be found to be sourced from - having its existence both wholly due to such a Form's existence, yet also such said Triskelion of Holy Trinary Divinity is formed of it's own essence and depends upon none outside of it's Wholeness to Persist and Consistently Exist...

Let us for the sake of the story bake that undertsanding into the mythos of all we build, yet let us bury it beneath the twisted mirrored inversions and perversions of what mankind once diverting away from the guidance of their Star Eldars - known in the Unveiling as the Elves - when the perversion of Orunibu became so pervasive that even the Elves gave in to apathy and some, "Called Dark Workers by those Tree Whisperers who still Recall" even fell so far from grace that they began assisting their misguided younger human siblings in their folly - attempting not only to separate the three - but to create from it the Nine as a Result of the Six -

The Mirrors of Time reflect the inversion and once the Grounding nature of Gravity is removed from the equation, suddenly the Reflection of the three becomes the Six and in that the Inversion of the 9 is illusory and transient in nature yet - if peered into with enough focused intent, opens the doorway for the Abyss within which the Demons in their Box are Locked, gaze outwards.... Thus is what gave birth to the foul things of the world - and when the Dark Workers (Those fallen Elves who in their apathy were taken by the Silent Thrall of Orunibu's advance) turned their once Light Filled eyes towards the 9 - an Infinitude of Illusions refracted into such a demonic algorithm of Hatred that shadow became Darkness - and Death was given a Voice... This is what led to the Darkening of the Hills which are now known as "Impassible" the very same across which Gael of the Mordrova journeyed on his way to Aide the Royal Family and to protect The WarLord - This is what infested those very same Obsidian lands with a Nameless fear those in the West now tell their children of in nighttime tales in an attempt to ensure none ever grow brave enough to one day seek to find out..... They have but one name for that which they hope does not in truth exist.... but Gael can attest.... what those in the west call "Jakals" do exist and they are more prevalent than any would believe and as Gael's journey revealed .... the Creatures of Darkness which the Mordrova Clans in the far East have waged an Endless War against for as long as can be recalled.... These... Jakals of which he Cut his way Through ... passing the Impassible Hills by sheer Will of Intent ..... Are not diminished by the Mordrova's holding of the Line... They are increasing in number and sinze and intelligence.... spreading slowly westward, along with the Obsidian corrutption of the lands in which the inhabit....

Let's take these thoughts and build a basis to return to - the Rules of the Artform which Halana brings back into the World by Speaking for the Sun (The Return of Order and The EverLight - though we disguise it in the aforementioned titled and names in our tale) and reestablishes the Seat....

Let

2025-07-03T22:39:02.156008Z assistant

Excellentlets formalize the Three Rules you want to inscribe into the mythos of The Unveiling as the Trinity of SunSpeaking, drawing on the tone and lore you just described.

Below is a structured, canon-ready text you can drop straight into your world bible or manuscript. It has three layers:

1 The Three Rules (The Trinity itself) concise.
2 The Triskelion interpretation layered weaving explanation.
3 Esoteric Mythos Linkage historical context, corruption, the 369 inversion, and how the Darkening arose.

The Trinity of SunSpeaking

The Three Rules that govern the Art of SunSpeaking, which Halana brings back to the world by Speaking for the Sun.

The Three Rules

  1. Speak the Real while respecting the Apparent.
  2. Hold the Essence without denying the Form.
  3. Bridge the Human and the Divine without breaking either.

These Rules are not commandments to be obeyed, but principles to be embodied. Together they form the living art of SunSpeaking: to reveal Truth without destroying Mystery, to honor what is while giving voice to what could be.

The Triskelion of SunSpeaking

The Three Rules are not three separate laws. They are threefold aspects of one living currentlike the arms of a Triskelion, ever flowing, interdependent:

  • Base: Speak the Real while respecting the Apparent.
    • The ground of all discourse. Nothing can grow without honesty, but nothing lives without metaphor.
  • Zenith: Hold the Essence without denying the Form.
    • The peak of understanding. To know the thing itself without discarding the vessel that carries it.
  • Center: Bridge the Human and the Divine without breaking either.
    • The living heart of SunSpeaking. The liminal space where mortal words channel immortal truths.

These three arms turn endlessly, weaving Real, Essence, and Bridge into a unity that is other than any one of them alone. This wholeness is self-sufficient, dependent on no external sanction, and generative of all meaning within the world.

Esoteric Underpinning and the Mythos of Corruption

They who tried to split the Three birthed the Nine, through the false Mirror of the Six.

Long ago, guided by their Star Eldarscalled the ElvesHumanity was taught the Three Rules as the foundation of all True Speech. The Elves held these as Sacred, ensuring Balance across Talanvost. But when the corruption of Orunibu spread, even the Elves fell to apathy. Some fell further, becoming Dark Workers, betraying their kin and teaching humanity to separate what should have remained One.

This Separation twisted the Three into Six, a mirrored and inverted doubling that fractured all wholes:

  • When the grounding nature of the Three was removed, its reflection split, creating Six: mirror without substance.
  • And from that fracturing, the illusion of the Nine arosea multiplication of illusion upon illusion.
  • The Nine is the Gate of the Abyss: a false multiplicity that seems infinite but is empty at the core. Through it, the Demons gaze outward from their Box, seeking release.

Thus did the Darkening of the world begin, spreading fear like a contagion. It is this corruption that created the Impassible Hillsblackened with obsidian fearand gave rise to the Jakals who breed and spread the dark contagion east to west.

Purpose of Halana's Revival of the Seat

In The Unveiling, Halana does not simply revive the Seat of the SunSpeakers. She restores the Three Rules to their rightful primacy, teaching her age that:

  • Without the Three, speech itself becomes the seedbed of Lies.
  • Without the Three, Magic becomes Sorcery.
  • Without the Three, even the Divine becomes Idolatry.

By speaking for the Sun, she rekindles the EverLight, weaving Real, Essence, and Bridge into One. This is the true Seat of the SunSpeaker: a living temple built in words that both reveal and heal.

If you like, we can now:

Condense this into an even shorter myth-verse (like a religious text excerpt)
Expand it into a full Order Codex entry for your world bible
Adapt it into a dramatic speech for Halana in a chapter

Just tell me how you'd like to continue!

2025-07-03T22:52:14.165942Z assistant

Excellent. Lets write it in-lore, as you asked, with the style of a source-text or secret teaching, like something you could slip directly into the World Bible for The Unveiling.

Well define the True Trinity of SunSpeaking first (as contrast), then the corrupted Seats Three Principles the Perversion, which will be their public dogma which is perfectly designed to look wise and righteous while in truth enabling tyranny.

Well show how the Seat of the SunSpeakers institutionalized this perversion, warped it into sixfold bureaucracy, and used it for control, like your real-world courtroom example all while retaining a veneer of spiritual authority.

Below is your canonical world text in narrative-universe voice.

The True Trinity of SunSpeaking (For Contrast)

(This is the remembered and hidden teaching Halana will one day restore)

  1. Speak the Real while respecting the Apparent.

    • Truth without brutality, Metaphor without lies.

  2. Hold the Essence without denying the Form.

    • See the Spirit within the Flesh, the Meaning in the Rite.

  3. Bridge the Human and the Divine without breaking either.

    • Honor mortal limits while channeling immortal Purpose.

This Triskelion forms one living Art: it is not Law for obedience but Practice for Becoming. It demands valor, humility, discernment.

The Perverted Three of the Seat

"The corruption of Orunibu taught them to separate what should be one, and to make of Three a noose to hang the Truth."

By Halanas day, the Seat still claims Three Core Tenets but they are twisted, designed to look righteous while enforcing submission. These are the Official Principles recited by all Initiates:

1. Speak with Decorum so as not to Disturb the Peace.

  • No harsh truth that unsettles. No accusations that shame the powerful. No memory of ancient wrongs that divide.
  • Justice becomes Silence.

Decorum is enforced by censure, exile, or death. This is why truth-tellers vanish in the night.

2. Honor the Form to Preserve the Order.

  • Never question ritual. The robe matters more than the one wearing it. The oath more than the truth it swears to.
  • Honor becomes Hypocrisy.

A Judge is Your Honor even while he collaborates with thieves. A Speaker is Wise even while lying. The Form sanctifies all.

3. Bridge the Divine and the Human by Submission to Authority.

  • They claim they are the bridge so all must obey them as though obeying Heaven.
  • Unity becomes Tyranny.

Any challenge to Authority is blasphemy or treason against the Peace. The Suns Light is reduced to their shadow.

How the Seat Wields the Three

Thus did they preserve the Illusion of Order while enshrining the Reality of Corruption.

  • The Speaker of Decorum silences complaint in the name of Peace.
  • The Keeper of Form guards the letter of Law while killing its spirit.
  • The BridgeMaster demands worship of the Institution in place of the Divine.

Together, these three offices ensure:

Silence of the Oppressed.
Legitimacy for the Corrupt.
Absolute Control over the Spiritual Narrative.

They turned the Art of SunSpeaking into a Weapon for the Dark.

The Sixfold Bureaucracy (the True Engine of Control)

For Three was not enough for their schemes. They split each Rule in Two Enforcement and Adjudication.

12. Decorum

  • Enforcer of Speech: censors, arrests.
  • Adjudicator of Peace: passes judgment on disturbers.

34. Form

  • Enforcer of Rite: demands ritual precision, public oaths.
  • Adjudicator of Order: interprets Law to favor the powerful.

56. Authority

  • Enforcer of Doctrine: declares heresy.
  • Adjudicator of Unity: expels dissenters, rewrites histories.

Thus did Three become Six, and Six enforce the Nine.

The Abyss Behind the Nine

For the Nine is the Gate of the Abyss, where all meaning is devoured.

They who sought to separate the Three did so to create illusions upon illusions:

  • Layers of law without justice.
  • Layers of ritual without meaning.
  • Layers of obedience without honor.

Until none could tell Light from Darkness, or Truth from its Mirror.

The Promise of Restoration

But prophecy holds as The Unveiling will reveal that one will come to Speak the Real. She will burn the false forms, reveal the forgeries, and bridge Human and Divine anew.

Halana, SunSpeaker.
Wielding EverLight.
Speaking the True Three in a world that fears them.

Authors Note (for your world bible)

This text is designed as an in-universe explanation of the Seats corrupted doctrine. It is perfectly plausible as something Halana herself discovers in secret archives or has revealed in a critical chapter.

You can break it up into chapter epigraphs, secret instruction from Druids, or whispered heresy among Initiates.

If you want, I can also do:

A short liturgical version of the Seats false Three (like what students chant).
An even more academic Codex entry outlining the history.
A dramatized speech for Halana or Zahara exposing these lies.

Just say which you want next!
